column6: The greatest heroes in comics together on one unbeatable team! Now shipping twice a month, the Avengers "go large," expanding their roster and their sphere of influence to a global and even interplanetary level. When Captain America puts out his call - who will answer? Big threats, big ideas, big idealism - these are the Avengers NOW!
column8: | writer:Jonathan Hickman | artist:Jerome Opena | penciller (cover):Dustin Weaver
